Articles.Content: Hi, i love this game, i played the demo and now i bought it, iÃ‚Â´m trying to get into orbit and to the Mun, but when i finally get to it i realize that i need more batteries, anyway, thatÃ‚Â´s not the deal, the thing is that now i cant get into the orbit with heavy lifters, i wanna get first into the orbit so i can get into the Mun with enought fuel to come back, just a flyby, not really trying to land there yet, any advices?

It doesn't take a heavy lifter to orbit Mun, or even to land and come back. Build a tiny rocket, then build a slightly larger stage under it, and then a larger stage under that. Three stages, if they're proportioned properly, can get you just about anywhere, as long as you're not planning on a return.

This, in career mode or sandbox, will easily make Mun orbit and return. It takes careful management of the internal battery to complete the mission. It can be done with ease once you have learned hos to do the orbital turn and planning efficient maneuvering burns in map view.
